hero.title: Transforming Urban Mobility with Smart Traffic & Parking Solutions
hero.subtitle: Traffix delivers two powerful innovations: AI-powered adaptive traffic signals that respond in real-time, and a seamless parking management platform that eliminates urban congestion while enhancing city living.

about.title: Our Story
about.content: Based in the heart of Yerevan, Traffix is dedicated to building smarter, more efficient cities. Our mission is to transform urban mobility through intelligent traffic management and innovative parking solutions. By combining advanced computer vision with cutting-edge machine learning, we create sustainable transportation ecosystems that benefit everyone. Our comprehensive parking platform enables effortless management of parking facilities across urban landscapes.

problem.title: The Urban Mobility Challenge
problem.content: Cities worldwide face significant economic losses and wasted time due to outdated traffic systems. Traditional fixed-time traffic lights fail to adapt to real-time conditions, creating unnecessary congestion, higher emissions, and frustrated commuters. In Armenia, drivers spend an average of 20 extra minutes daily navigating inefficient traffic. Additionally, finding parking in Yerevan and other major cities remains a persistent challenge, demanding innovative solutions for streamlined parking management and reservation systems.

solution.title: Intelligent Urban Mobility Solutions
solution.content: Traffix introduces an adaptive traffic management system that leverages live camera data and sophisticated AI algorithms to dynamically optimize traffic light timing. Our system is designed to reduce average wait times by 35% and significantly lower emissions by creating smoother, more efficient traffic flow throughout urban centers.
